resources.string: Lime Scooter\n\n Click Button to Ride, Tap to go back
Sample Feedback View\n\n Tap to go back
Please contact us for any questions or concerns at:\n\n scooterapp123@gmail.com

How to Use

 1. Click on options menu.

 2. Click on manage accounts. 

 3. Login to the app using a verified Bird/Lime email. 

 4. Enter token received in said email. 

 5. The app should function now. 

 6. Click on any scooter nearby to ride.
Enter the email associated with your Bird account:
Enter the email associated with your Bird account
Login complete! Press continue to return to the main menu.
Could not log into your Bird account. Please try again.
An access token will be sent by Bird to your email. This will look like a random string of characters and numbers. Copy and paste the token below:
Enter the email associated with your Lime account:
Enter the phone number associated with your Lime account:
Login complete! Press continue to return to the main menu.
Could not log into your Lime account. Please try again.
A 6-digit code will be sent by Lime to your phone number. Copy and paste the code below:
Welcome, sign in to account(s), then go back and move the map around to view scooters.
A list of the scooter apps the user has registered with.
